title: Eddie George – 1997 Speech at the Queen Elizabeth Conference Centre
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Eddie George, the then Governor of the Bank of England, on 25 February 1997.
content:
[Speech text (.pdf format)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/eddiegeorge1997.pdf)
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
  *[ABI]: Association of British Insurers
  *[CMU]: Capital Markets Union
